column1: #Text=Ikki says : " We missed you so much , Korra . "
#Text=Korra says : " I missed you so much , too .
#Text=" Jinora says : " But we never would have been here if it were n't for Ikki .
#Text=" Ikki says : " I never would have stormed off and run into those soldiers if it were n't for Meelo .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I was trying to toughen up these ladies , but I guess it was a team effort .
#Text=" Ikki says : " I love your hair .
#Text=" Toph says : " Your grandpa was a real pain in my butt .
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , I like this one .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You need to come home , Korra .
#Text=Kuvira is taking over the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Ikki says : " You have to stop her .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know ... I 'm not the Avatar I used to be .
#Text=I ca n't even go into the Avatar State .
#Text=" Jinora says : " The world needs you back .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm not bending it out of you .
#Text=You 've got to do this on your own .
#Text=And do n't freak out , like last time !
#Text=" Toph says : " That fight is over .
#Text=" Meelo says : " The Avatar is back in business !
#Text=" Korra says : " I feel so much lighter .
#Text=Thank you so much for helping me .
#Text=I 'd like to give you a hug now , if that 's okay with you .
#Text=" Toph says : " All right , you earned it .
